desc: FLOMEC offer you solutions and products for flow measurement and process control in a wide range of flow meter technologies including positive displacement, ultrasonic, mag, turbine and impeller. Suitable for a wide range of industries and application, with exceptional quality and reliability.

layout.text:
Manufactured with exceptional quality, FLOMEC flowmeters, batching & control instrumentation is engineered to measure, monitor and distribute your liquid assets.

Reduce waste, optimise consumption and enable tomorrow.
